jesterMod:JesterCap.NAME: Jester's cap
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you shuffle your deck, draw a card. NL (Up to 3 times per turn)

jesterMod:JesterMask.NAME: Jester's mask
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you shuffle your deck, gain 1 life.

jesterMod:JokerCard.NAME: Joker Card
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 4 times you shuffle your deck, gain 1 intangible.

jesterMod:HauntedLute.NAME: Haunted Lute
jesterMod:HauntedLute.FLAVOR: Engraves music deep within your soul.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, Gain [E] and discard a random card.

jesterMod:MirrorMask.NAME: Mirror Mask
DESCRIPTIONS: When you become #bVulnerable, apply as many #bVulnerable to a random enemy. NL When you become #bWeakened, apply as many #bWeakened to a random enemy.

jesterMod:LoadedDice.NAME: Loaded Dice
DESCRIPTIONS: You can choose what cards are discarded when you #brecycle.

jesterMod:DefectEssence.NAME: Defect's Essence
DESCRIPTIONS: Blue cards can be obtained. NL Gain 1 orb slot.

jesterMod:RuskiBroom.NAME: Ruski's Broom
DESCRIPTIONS: When you discard a curse or status, Exhaust it.

jesterMod:PhilosopherAmphora.NAME: Philosopher's Amphora
jesterMod:PhilosopherAmphora.FLAVOR: Smells weird, but you don't have the heart to throw it away.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, Apply 1 #yDisposophobe to a random ennemy.

jesterMod:HarlequinCap.NAME: HarlequinCap
DESCRIPTIONS: When you shuffle your draw pile, choose a card from your draw pile and add it to your hand. NL (Up to 3 times per turn) NL Replaces #yJester's #yCap.

jesterMod:LargeSleeves.NAME: Large Sleeves
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 10 times you discard a card, draw a card.

jesterMod:MachoBrace.NAME: Macho Brace
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, Gain [E] . NL You can neither gain nor lose Strength or Dexterity.

jesterMod:BagOfTricks.NAME: Bag of Tricks
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of battle add a #yPrank to your hand, discard pile and draw pile.
